flawed_nl_solution:
The dog runs 0.4 miles per minute because 24 / 60 = <<24/60=0.4>>0.4
The rabbit runs 0.25 miles per minute because 15 / 60 = <<15/60=0.25>>0.25
Therefore (Number of Minutes) = 40
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3.999999999999999, not 40. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
